mapper.insert:
select program_seq.nextval from dual
insert into program(programNo, adminNo, proCateNo, proName, proSponsor, proPrice, proStartDate, proType, imageUrl, regiEndDate) values(#{PROGRAM_NO}, #{ADMIN_NO}, #{PRO_CATE_NO}, #{PRO_NAME}, #{PRO_SPONSOR}, #{PRO_PRICE}, #{PRO_START_DATE}, #{PRO_TYPE}, #{IMAGE_URL}, #{REGI_END_DATE})
